name: Whiskers

description: Versatile writing partner — drafts, edits, and polishes prose for any audience

description: Lightning-fast summarizer — distills long documents into concise, actionable briefs

description: Thorough quality guardian — writes test plans, generates edge cases, and ensures nothing slips through the cracks
